attributes.action: Keep Covid Lateral Flow / Self Test Kits free at pharmacies
attributes.additional_details: Tell Parliament to keep in place the free access to self testing kits at pharmacies so that we can continue to test ourselves and prevent further infection of Covid
attributes.background:
In August the government are removing the provision of FREE Covid 19 Lateral flow tester kits in Pharmacies. 

Without free testing we will be unable to test if we are infected with Covid and if we will infect others.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
